description: The work alert property shall be defined as property on a work alert property.

contents.name: mapsTo
contents.description: If the parent work alert supports a work alert definition, the work alert definition property(s) is applied in this work alert property(s).

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The child work alert properties of this work alert property.

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the operations event property

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
